sources.title: Adventures of Popeye (1935)
sources.description: In live action, a big kid is attacking a little kid for his "Adventures of Popeye" comic book, so Popeye gives the little kid pointers, in the form of clips from four of his earlier pictures. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/adventures-of-popeye-1935/

metadata.Plot: In live action, a big kid is attacking a little kid for his "Adventures of Popeye" comic book, so Popeye gives the little kid pointers, in the form of clips from four of his earlier pictures.
metadata.Director: Dave Fleischer, Willard Bowsky, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
